Test Name: HER2 Amplification (ERBB2) in Breast Cancer Tissue by FISH
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) breast cancer tissue sections
Purpose: To detect HER2 (ERBB2) gene amplification in breast cancer tissue, aiding selection of patients for HER2-targeted therapies.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged glass slides with 4–5 µm tissue sections
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope with FITC/Texas Red filters, hybridization oven/incubator, slide warmer, microtome
